Body:
total_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
os.chdir(total_path)
dyn = CC.Phonons.Phonons('dyn', 32)
q_vector = np.array([0.25, 0, 0]) / dyn.alat
t2 = CC.ForceTensor.Tensor2(dyn.structure, dyn.structure.generate_supercell
    (dyn.GetSupercell()), dyn.GetSupercell())
t2.SetupFromPhonons(dyn)
time1 = time.time()
t2.Center()
time2 = time.time()
print('Time to the full centerng:', time2 - time1, 's')
dynq_full = t2.Interpolate(-q_vector, asr=False)
test_dynmat = CC.Phonons.Phonons('matdyn_dyn', full_name=True)
dist = np.max(np.abs(test_dynmat.dynmats[0] - dynq_full)) / np.max(np.abs(
    test_dynmat.dynmats[0]))
assert dist < 1e-05
